channel.title: Making my server be less like runescape,and making it into a business.REP++
channel.description:
Hey so the title explains it all.
I need ways to make my rsps into a more kind of business rather than a hobby. Also,and can i make it less like runescape? Because naturally i dont want jagex closing me down. I was thinking of changing the names of all the important items and locations?What do you guys think?
This may seem stupid and short,but i havent got long so just really need you guys to give me a hand. Thanks. :)

item.title: Making my server be less like runescape,and making it into a business.REP++
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

Well, it all depends on your knowledge. What you know. A decent programmer is someone who is not you. A decent programmer is someone who is fluent in java. You most likely are not
I suggest just trying to make new areas, new maps, anything not in runescape atm.

Read full topic

@pasta186 wrote:

I normally ask some coders to give me a hand ;). Thing is,i want a server that i can show off,i dont want to have to worried that Fagex is coming to close me down or that people think ‘Oh.runescape’.

item.title: Making my server be less like runescape,and making it into a business.REP++
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351

item.source: Making my server be less like runescape,and making it into a business.REP++

item.title: Making my server be less like runescape,and making it into a business.REP++
item.dc:creator: @Mill Mill
item.description:
@Mill wrote:

pasta186:

Thing is,i want my rsps to be LESS rsps. If that makes sense. Like,i dont want to go create a new game but i want it as far away from runescape as possible?

Listen, you have to be creative. I’m sorry I can’t help you with your own programming/creativity skills, but you can help yourself. I understand what you mean, but if you don’t want it all runescapey just do what I said. Adding some new skills, items, and minigames aren’t making it a new game, but if you really work on your customs it will be less like the other RSPS. BTW, you can’t make it any less RSPS, there is no changing what it really is: a RuneScape Private Server. The definition to that is: A server much like RuneScape that is played through a client taken from Jagex. The definition doesn’t say anywhere that it has to have anything to be an RSPS. You get what I’m saying?

Read full topic
item.source: Making my server be less like runescape,and making it into a business.REP++

item.source: Making my server be less like runescape,and making it into a business.REP++

item.title: Making my server be less like runescape,and making it into a business.REP++
item.dc:creator: @Mill Mill
item.description:
@Mill wrote:

pasta186:

Hm i know,people would get confused over what weapons are what. Any ideas how to make it less like runescape?

People want a bit of RuneScape, not a custom-filled joke. Make sure to leave basic things that make RuneScape what it is. A few things you could add are things like custom minigames, a few custom items (not ridiculous bad-modeled ones), like I said before, Vote4cash, a one payment lifetime donation, and maybe even a couple custom skills. They aren’t usually something that can be made in a day, it could take anywhere from a week to a few months to get a fully functional skill client-side and server-side.

Read full topic
item.source: Making my server be less like runescape,and making it into a business.REP++

item.source: Making my server be less like runescape,and making it into a business.REP++

item.title: Making my server be less like runescape,and making it into a business.REP++
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

First of all make it unique. Change up skills, add your own twist. (New bonuses, etc.) If you are good with GFX then add new GFX’s, specials, or re write how it is handled. Re write the comba triagle, maybe add a new combat. There is tons that can be done.

Read full topic

item.title: Making my server be less like runescape,and making it into a business.REP++
item.dc:creator: @Mill Mill
item.description:
@Mill wrote:

[quote=“pasta186, post:1, topic:431014”]Hey so the title explains it all.

I need ways to make my rsps into a more kind of business rather than a hobby.
Also,and can i make it less like runescape? Because naturally i dont want jagex closing me down.
I was thinking of changing the names of all the important items and locations?What do you guys think?

This may seem stupid and short,but i havent got long so just really need you guys to give me a hand. Thanks. :)[/quote]

Get a VPS or Dedi server, get a MySQL, PHP, and Apache server, make donor automated, make vote4cash, make a forum, and the way that separates a big business from a small one is: Shitty customer service.

Read full topic
item.source: Making my server be less like runescape,and making it into a business.REP++

item.title: Making my server be less like runescape,and making it into a business.REP++
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

People who play Runescape private servers want runescape, but just a different version. Having a dragon longsword be named a Red Longsword or whatever is just bad. Making it less like Runescape is good however.

Read full topic
